title: In the case of lessor authorities such as New Town Development Authorities as land owner, such Authorities may recover lease premium for additional F
clause_text: In the case of lessor authorities such as New Town Development Authorities as land owner, such Authorities may recover lease premium for additional F.S.I., if applicable, under their land disposal policy.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In the case of lessor authorities such as New Town Development Authorities as land owner, such Authorities may recover lease premium for additional F.S.I., if applicable, under their land disposal pol
